metadata.Title: CVE-2007-0667 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The redirect function in Form.pm for (1) LedgerSMB before 1.1.5 and (2)SQL-Ledger allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code viaredirects, related to callbacks, a different issue than CVE-2006-5872.

criterions.comment: sql-ledger: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
